long_description: A simple and organized adventure travel pack for people who want to travel light, the Boreas Sapa Trek Pack is built with extra pockets and compression to hold all of your travel accessories. Shaped, perforated EVA foam back panel helps keep your back cool. Tri-zip opening; internal organization pockets; hidden daisy chains; waterproof storage pocket; removable frame; raincover. The Boreas Sapa Trek Pack is made of 210-denier ripstop nylon with impregnated silicone coating and a tough 420-denier bottom. Closeout.
short_description: A simple and organized adventure travel pack for people who want to travel light, the Boreas Sapa Trek Pack is built with extra pockets and compression to hold all of your travel accessories.
